title: Adobe Photoshop Elements 2025 & Premiere Elements 2025 Student & Teacher Edition | PC/Mac Code | Box with Download Code | Photo & Video Editing | 3-year term license | Activation Required
description: With the magic of AI and automation behind the scenes, it’s never been easier to create amazing photos and shareworthy videos. • Discover new ways to combine pics and remove objects, create depth, and change colors in your photos, or style title text and transform colors in your videos. • Grow your skills with dozens of step-by-step Guided Edits. • Make any photo your creative canvas with new modern textures and graphics and enhance your video storytelling with eye-catching effects and transitions. • Share favorite moments in Photo Reels, Highlight Reels, collages, slideshows, and more. • Effortlessly organize it all. And be creative on the go with the web and mobile companion apps (beta).
Note: The Elements web and mobile beta apps are available in English, French, German, and Japanese.

Windows • Intel 6th Generation or newer processor or AMD equivalent with SSE4.2 support • Microsoft Windows 10 (version 22H2) or Windows 11 (version 23H2), 64-bit versions only; Windows 7, Windows 8.1 not supported • 8GB of RAM • 15GB of available hard-disk space to install application; additional space required for downloading online content and for temporary files during product installation and usage (cannot install on a volume that uses a case-sensitive file system or on removable flash storage devices) • 1440x900 display resolution (at 100% scale factor) • Microsoft DirectX 12 compatible sound and display driver • Windows Media Player (required if importing Windows Media files)

macOS • Intel 6th Generation or newer processor; Apple silicon M1 or newer processor • macOS 13, macOS 14 (14.4 or later) • 8GB of RAM • 15GB of available hard-disk space to install application; additional space required for downloading online content and for temporary files during product installation and usage (cannot install on a volume that uses a case-sensitive file system or on removable flash storage devices) • 1440x900 display resolution (at 100% scale factor)
